name: Unterseejaeger
description:
A submarine combat simulation prototype I made for my game design workshop class., featuring the Soviet Oscar-class submarine, and the American Oliver Hazard Perry-class frigate.

Has all the basic features- you can switch between full speed or silent mode, and switch between passive detection sonar and active sonar pings. The enemy has no way of fighting back currently, which is a bit of a shame since the Hazard Perry has two helicopter hangars and a helipad.  Still, it's best to avoid detection as the enemy ships will take evasive action. Since there is no wire guidance, once you launch the torpedo it has a mind of its own, and then its up to the ship and torpedo AI to see who can outsmart the other. 

Controls:

WASD -Acceleration/turning

Control/Spacebar - Elevation

E - Torpedo

R - Toggle active/passive sonar

F - Toggle silent mode

1,2,3- Toggle camera modes
